description: Try our easy to follow Mango Puddings recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fruit pudding,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Mango,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Mango Puddings Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Drain mango in syrup and reserve 1 cup of the liquid. purée mango flesh and set aside. Rinse anchor sago under running water. Drain.
Combine reserved mango liquid in a saucepan with sago, water and sugar. Bring to the boil over medium-high heat.
Reduce heat to low and simmer, stirring frequently, for about 20 minutes or until sago is translucent.
Add coconut and simmer gently for a further 6 minutes, until mixture is thick and sago is no longer white. Stir in mango purée.
Spoon into 6 small ramekins. Cover and chill until firm.
